item.title: Trump heads to NATO, minimizes time as he shrugs off global meetings
item.description: Trump is heading to NATO for a trip lasting barely a day. It’s the pattern of his second term — attend international meetings, but don’t stay long.

item.title: Trump criticizes Ocasio-Cortez in demeaning terms after she floats impeachment
item.description: The president also lashed out at two other female Democratic lawmakers, Reps. Jasmine Crockett (Texas) and Ilhan Omar (Minnesota).

item.title: Jan. 6 rioter ordered to pay $500K to widow of officer who killed himself
item.description: A federal jury held David Walls-Kaufman liable for assaulting police officer Jeffrey Smith during the U.S. Capitol riot and ordered him to pay damages...

item.title: Trump questions U.S. commitment to NATO defense
item.description: Trump, en route to the NATO summit, once again raises questions about his commitment to the alliance’s pledge of mutual defense.

item.title: House Democrats pick Robert Garcia, 47, to lead them on Oversight Committee
item.description: Garcia is an up-and-coming sophomore from California who promised to usher in a new generation of leadership for Democrats on the committee.
